header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Going outside, times of day, sleeping, lunch/dinner, eating schedule, lounge/ bedroom, families and watching TV, reading, silence and noise, nature sounds,
header.activity: Father and daughter converse on the way to visit family
